lead_paragraph: Kevin Faulk, the New England Patriots running back, has been issued a misdemeanor summons in Lafayette, La., for possession of marijuana. Captain John Babin of the Lafayette Metro Narcotics Task Force said that Faulk was on his way to watch a performance by the rapper Lil’ Wayne when a search by a sheriff’s deputy turned up four marijuana cigarettes.
